content: Hi! Is any organization perhaps missing in "In addition, some resources were developed in coordination with the following organizations: DICOM and IHE" at https://www.hl7.org/fhir/credits.html :-)
@Erik Sundvall Just an oversight. Can you submit a change proposal? (Link at the bottom of the page)

@Lloyd McKenzie I tried and failed. It seems I need to get manual approval of some HL7 admin before my registration in your bug tracker is accepted and after that I might be allowed to submit a change proposal... Could you do the change proposal (adding openEHR to the collaboration/coordination list)?
Lloyd is the admin! Where was the failure?
I see your registration and it was approved. Check your spam folder for the confirmation email and click on the activation link. If you can't find it, let me know and I'll activate you manually.
You found the email in your spam folder or you need me to do a manual activation?
